Summary: my son witnessed this ufo launching out of like sugar cane field , flew in front of truck, hovered over house, then vanished.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Homestead
There were no other sightings in Homestead on or around December 28th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son chris was returning from school in the evening,while sitting in his mothers truck expedition,in the back seat,looking around,some lights to his right caught his attention,he believed it to be a ufo right away because of its circle,saucer,disk shape,lights,red,blue underneath, around the saucer,steady lights launching itself out of a what seems to be like sugar cane field,out and past in front of the vehicle,stopped over a house then vanished in front of him. his feelings were of surprised,excited,happy,his reaction was he yelled to his mother mommy look up to that house, the mother says she saw nothing, then the object vanished. and this cught him by surprise amazed how it just vanished,the child says it was about the size of the ford expedition,where he then got a headache.
